Dear List

Here is a link to the LA Times page. They have a revue of the Exhibition, 
however you have to sign up for a free 14 day trial subsscription, which you 
then have to cancel by telephone. They ask for your credit card details etc.

http://www.calendarlive.com/printedition/calendar/calwknd/

Otherwise you can read the two-part revue in todays calender section of the 
LA Times.

Thanks for the net time

Paul.
